meanings.definition: A simple sugar found in honey and fruits.
meanings.sent1: Honey contains laevulose, a natural sweetener.
meanings.sent2: Fruits like apples and pears also have laevulose in them.
meanings.sent3: The bees were buzzing happily, collecting laevulose from the flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as laevulose, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh honey filled the kitchen, carrying the scent of laevulose.

meanings.definition: A monosaccharide with the same chemical formula as fructose.
meanings.sent1: Laevulose and fructose have similar chemical structures.
meanings.sent2: When you eat fruits, your body breaks down laevulose into energy.
meanings.sent3: The scientist accidentally spilled a jar of laevulose, creating a sticky mess.
meanings.sent4: His ideas flowed smoothly, like the conversion of laevulose into glucose.
meanings.sent5: The students marveled at the intricate process of metabolizing laevulose in biology class.
